= Squid }} is a city that is in Hokkaidō, Japan. Hakodate is beside the Tsugaru Strait, there is also a mountain called Mount Hakodate, that is next to the city. == References == == Other websites == * City of Hakodate (in Japanese) Category:Cities in Hokkaido
